name: Synaptic Override
flavor: You control an enemy's nervous system. How pleasant for them.

metadata.flavor: You control an enemy's nervous system. How pleasant for them.

effects.tier1: The target makes a free strike against one enemy of your choice.
effects.tier2: The target shifts up to their speed and uses their signature ability against any enemies of your choice.
effects.tier3: The target moves up to their speed and uses their signature ability against any enemies of your choice.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: You control the target's movement. The target can't be moved in a way that would harm them (such as over a cliff), leave them dying, or result in them suffering a condition or other negative effect. However, you can move them to provoke opportunity attacks.

effects.name: Strained
effects.effect: You take 1d6 damage and are weakened until the end of your turn.
